name: Lápis Azul
description:
Learn About Portuguese history, through a platforming journal.

Aprende sobre historia Portuguesa, através de um jornal com plataformas. 

In the year 1926, the Portuguese "Estado novo" started, it lasted until 1974. In this game you will learn about some of the events that occured during this era, specially, what lead the country to breakdown into revolutions troughout it's colonies.

No ano 1926, começou o "Estado novo" português e durou até ao ano de 1974. Neste jogo irás aprender sobre como alguns dos eventos desta época ocorreram, mais especificamente, o que levou o país a revoluções nas suas colonias.

This game is entirely built in Portuguese, so it is advisable to understand the language to be able to get the full experience.

Features:

  • Free drawing!
  • Different height jumps
  • Portuguese History
  • Collectibles

Controls:

  • Move: A and D, or Left and right arrow keys
  • Draw: Mouse left click
  • Erase: Mouse right click
  • Jump: Spacebar
